channel.title: 80 useful tools and services for software startups
channel.description:
[Andy Brice][1] (a long time friend from the BoS days), has put together a [list of 80 useful tools and services][2] for those of us running software companies. Check it out; it seems to be a really well-curated collection.
[1]: http://www.successfulsoftware.net [2]: http://successfulsoftware.net/tools_and_services/
